author: Simon Difford
description: Two traditional punches remain on today's cocktail lists, the 'Rum Punch' and the 'Hot Whisky Punch', now better known as the 'Hot Toddy'. Also bear in mind that the Gin Punch probably led to the creation of the Collins.
name: Punch (Generic Name)
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Freshly squeezed lemon or lime juice
45 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
67.5 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice
